aboutme.title: Who I am
aboutme.first-text: Hello, my name is Marco and I am a German-speaking frontend developer from Plettenberg. Driven by the unlimited possibilities of IT, I am passionate about developing visually appealing and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutme.second-text: I am flexible and work effectively both on site in Plettenberg and remotely. Thanks to my adaptability, I integrate easily into teams or work independently on projects, always with clear communication and a structured way of working.
aboutme.third-text: I am open to new ideas and always strive to develop personally. Always on the lookout for exciting challenges, I see every task as an opportunity to take my knowledge and skills to the next level.
aboutme.fourth-text: In my job, programming is not just writing code, but a creative way of solving problems. I pride myself on turning complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This is how I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skills.title: Technologies
skills.text-skillset: As part of my training in the front and backend fields, I have worked on various projects, utilizing a wide range of technologies and concepts. I am open to new approaches to continuously expand my skills and stay up to date in the ever-evolving world of web development.
skills.second-title: Do you need an additional skill?
skills.second-text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge and gaining new experiences.

project-info.subtitle: Task Managment Tool
project-info.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop functionality, and assign users and categories.
project-info.description1: A jumping, running, and throwing game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and Tabasco sauce to fight against the crazy hen.
project-info.description2: This app is a Slack clone. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface.

references.title: What my colleagues say about me
references.textbox1: Marco has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.
references.textbox2: Marco's calm manner helped us to stay focused on the project work. His technical skills were extremely helpful for the success of our projects.
references.textbox3: Working with Marco is always a pleasure. He brings fresh ideas and creative solutions to the table.
